articles.title: Dementia's Rarity in Greek and Roman Times - Neuroscience News

articles.title: Stress response silencing by an E3 ligase mutated in neurodegeneration - Nature.com
articles.description: The E3 ligase SIFI is identified as a dedicated silencing factor of the integrated stress response, a finding that has implications for the development of therapeutics for neurodegenerative diseases caused by mitochondrial protein import stress.

articles.title: Measles surge causes alarm: what scientists think - Nature.com
articles.description: A drastic rise in infections in the United Kingdom and Europe follows a drop in vaccine uptake.

articles.title: Matrix viscoelasticity promotes liver cancer progression in the pre-cirrhotic liver - Nature.com
articles.description: Structural changes mediated by advanced glycation end-products enhance extracellular matrix viscoelasticity, and that viscoelasticity can promote cancer progression in vivo, independent of stiffness.

articles.title: Natural inhibitor found for cell death by ferroptosis - Nature.com
articles.description: Molecule used to make cholesterol also protects against cell death.
